author: elecharny
msg: o Removed the cursor and evaluators when the count is 0, as we won't have any candidate from those cursors.
o Removed the Or and And cursors when they only have one single child
This results in a 15% speed improvement in complex filter searches.

author: jukka
msg: The return value of property.getValues() can be immutable, so create a new list before modifying it.
